description:
Welcome to Tako Loko VR (Alpha version)

Have fun and live the experience to learn how to prepare mexican tacos in the world of the death by trying to serve all customers before they get mad and leave.

Warning:

This is a VR game currently on development, in order to play it you need a PC and a compatible VR headset.

System requirements:

  • PC running Windows 10.
  • Dedicated graphics card (nVidia 1060 or higher).
  • VR headset (preferably Oculus Rift).
  • Motion controllers.

Controllers:

  • Trigger buttons: Interact with menus.
  • Grip buttons: Grab and drop stuff.
  • Left stick: Walk around.
  • Right stick: View rotation.

A small tutorial:

  1. Wait for the customers to arrive
  2. Grab a tortilla and put the ingredients on it according to the customer's order number to make a taco. You can also use the knife to cut the "trompo de pastor" and the pineaple if necessary.
  3. Put the taco on a dish and give it to the customer.
  4. The order may include a soda so grab the sodas behind you and give it to the customer if necessary.
  5. Complete 3 waves of customers, each one with less time to prepare the tacos.
